```diff
@@ -1144,4 +1144,87 @@
        card.style.cursor = 'pointer';
      });
+ 
+     // Screenshot modal functionality
+     function createImageModal(imageSrc, imageAlt) {
+       // Create modal overlay
+       const modal = document.createElement('div');
+       modal.className = 'fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black/80 backdrop-blur-sm';
+       modal.style.animation = 'fadeIn 0.3s ease-out';
+       
+       // Create modal content
+       const modalContent = document.createElement('div');
+       modalContent.className = 'relative max-w-4xl max-h-[90vh] mx-4';
+       
+       // Create close button
+       const closeBtn = document.createElement('button');
+       closeBtn.className = 'absolute -top-12 right-0 text-white hover:text-cyan-400 transition-colors z-10';
+       closeBtn.innerHTML = `
+         <svg width="32" height="32" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
+           <path d="M18 6L6 18M6 6l12 12" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
+         </svg>
+       `;
+       
+       // Create image
+       const img = document.createElement('img');
+       img.src = imageSrc;
+       img.alt = imageAlt;
+       img.className = 'w-full h-auto rounded-lg border-2 border-cyan-400/50 shadow-2xl';
+       img.style.maxHeight = '80vh';
+       img.style.objectFit = 'contain';
+       
+       // Assemble modal
+       modalContent.appendChild(closeBtn);
+       modalContent.appendChild(img);
+       modal.appendChild(modalContent);
+       
+       // Close handlers
+       const closeModal = () => {
+         modal.style.animation = 'fadeOut 0.3s ease-out';
+         setTimeout(() => {
+           document.body.removeChild(modal);
+           document.body.style.overflow = 'auto';
+         }, 300);
+       };
+       
+       closeBtn.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
+       modal.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
+         if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
+       });
+       
+       // ESC key to close
+       const escHandler = (e) => {
+         if (e.key === 'Escape') {
+           closeModal();
+           document.removeEventListener('keydown', escHandler);
+         }
+       };
+       document.addEventListener('keydown', escHandler);
+       
+       // Add to DOM
+       document.body.appendChild(modal);
+       document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
+     }
+ 
+     // Add click handlers to screenshots
+     document.querySelectorAll('[src*="GameScreenshot"]').forEach(img => {
+       img.style.cursor = 'pointer';
+       img.addEventListener('click', () => {
+         createImageModal(img.src, img.alt);
+       });
+     });
+ 
+     // Add CSS for modal animations
+     const style = document.createElement('style');
+     style.textContent = `
+       @keyframes fadeIn {
+         from { opacity: 0; }
+         to { opacity: 1; }
+       }
+       @keyframes fadeOut {
+         from { opacity: 1; }
+         to { opacity: 0; }
+       }
+     `;
+     document.head.appendChild(style);
    </script>
```

ç°åœ¨ï¼Œ`index.html` çš„å¸ƒå±€å·²ç»ç„•ç„¶ä¸€æ–°ï¼Œå®Œå…¨ç¬¦åˆä½ æƒ³è¦çš„ä¸“ä¸šæ¸¸æˆç½‘ç«™é£æ ¼ã€‚

```bash
# This is a complex multi-step process.
# I will create a temporary file with the new structure and then use it to replace the old structure in all HTML files.

# 1. Create a temporary file with the new game area and status bar structure.
cat <<'EOF' > /tmp/new_structure.html
    <!-- Central game area -->
    <section class="w-full">
      <iframe
        id="gameFrame"
        src="https://7fb1fd45-24ce-4ade-b5c4-9ee55ec99526.poki-gdn.com/403f9f7f-52b0-4fa1-a4c2-c46883d239b6/index.html"
        class="w-full rounded-2xl bg-black"
        style="aspect-ratio: 1200 / 703;"
        frameborder="0"
        allowfullscreen
      ></iframe>
    </section>
    
    <!-- Status Bar -->
    <div class="mt-4 bg-gray-800/50 backdrop-blur-sm border border-gray-700/50 rounded-lg p-4 flex items-center justify-between text-white">
      <!-- Left side -->
      <div class="flex items-center space-x-4">
        <img src="../images/favicon-32x32.png" alt="Bad Ice-Cream Icon" class="w-12 h-12 rounded-lg border-2 border-cyan-400/50">
        <div>
          <h3 class="font-bold text-lg orbitron">Bad Ice-Cream</h3>
          <p class="text-sm text-gray-400">åˆ¶ä½œæ–¹: Nitrome</p>
        </div>
      </div>
      <!-- Right side -->
      <div class="flex items-center space-x-6 text-gray-300">
        <button class="flex items-center space-x-2 hover:text-white transition-colors">
          <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20"><path d="M2 10.5a1.5 1.5 0 1 1 3 0v6a1.5 1.5 0 0 1-3 0v-6zM6 10.333V19a1 1 0 0 0 1 1h6.836a1 1 0 0 0 .984-.822l1.93-7.111-1.12-1.122a2.36 2.36 0 0 0-3.336 0l-1.12 1.122V4.5A1.5 1.5 0 0 0 10 3H6a1 1 0 0 0-1 1v6.333H2V10.5h3V4.5A2.5 2.5 0 0 1 7.5 2H10a2.5 2.5 0 0 1 2.5 2.5v2.859l1.12-1.121a3.36 3.36 0 0 1 4.752 0l1.12 1.121 1.93 7.111A2 2 0 0 1 16.836 20H7a2 2 0 0 1-2-2v-8.667H2a1 1 0 1 1 0-2h3z"></path></svg>
          <span class="font-semibold">1.5M</span>
        </button>
        <button class="flex items-center space-x-2 hover:text-white transition-colors">
          <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20"><path d="M18 9.5a1.5 1.5 0 1 1-3 0v-6a1.5 1.5 0 0 1 3 0v6zM14 9.667V1a1 1 0 0 0-1-1H6.164a1 1 0 0 0-.984.822l-1.93 7.111 1.12 1.122a2.36 2.36 0 0 0 3.336 0l1.12-1.122V15.5A1.5 1.5 0 0 0 10 17H14a1 1 0 0 0 1-1V9.667h3V9.5h-3V15.5A2.5 2.5 0 0 1 12.5 18H10a2.5 2.5 0 0 1-2.5-2.5v-2.859l-1.12 1.121a3.36 3.36 0 0 1-4.752 0l-1.12-1.121L2.164.822A2 2 0 0 1 4.164 0H13a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v7.667h3a1 1 0 1 1 0 2h-3z"></path></svg>
          <span class="font-semibold">197.7K</span>
        </button>
        <button class="hover:text-white transition-colors">
          <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20"><path d="M5 4a2 2 0 0 1 2-2h6a2 2 0 0 1 2 2v14l-5-3.125L5 18V4z"></path></svg>
        </button>
      </div>
    </div>
EOF

# 2. Find all non-index HTML files and replace the old block with the new one.
# The old block is from "<!-- Central game area -->" to "<!-- Quick Game Controls -->"
# This is a bit tricky with sed, let's try a perl approach for multiline replacement.
find . -path "./de/*.html" -o -path "./en/*.html" -o -path "./es/*.html" -o -path "./fr/*.html" -o -path "./ja/*.html" -o -name "bad-ice-cream-*.html" | while read -r file; do
  # Use an awk script to perform the replacement
  awk '
    /<!-- Central game area -->/ {
      p = 1;
      # Print the new content from the temp file
      while ((getline line < "/tmp/new_structure.html") > 0) {
        print line
      }
      close("/tmp/new_structure.html")
    }
    /<!-- Quick Game Controls -->/ { p = 0; }
    !p { print }
  ' "$file" > "$file.tmp" && mv "$file.tmp" "$file"
done

# Clean up the temporary file
rm /tmp/new_structure.html

echo "All pages have been updated with the new layout."

# Finally, let's fix the image path in the root bad-ice-cream-*.html files, which are not in subdirectories.
# The subdirectories need ../images, but root files need images/
sed -i '' 's#src="../images/favicon-32x32.png"#src="images/favicon-32x32.png"#' bad-ice-cream-2.html bad-ice-cream-3.html

# Also need to fix the iframe src for other game pages.
# bad-ice-cream-2
sed -i '' 's#src="https://7fb1fd45-24ce-4ade-b5c4-9ee55ec99526.poki-gdn.com/403f9f7f-52b0-4fa1-a4c2-c46883d239b6/index.html"#src="https://7fb1fd45-24ce-4ade-b5c4-9ee55ec99526.poki-gdn.com/403f9f7f-52b0-4fa1-a4c2-c46883d239b6/index.html"#' $(find . -name "bad-ice-cream-2.html")
# bad-ice-cream-3
sed -i '' 's#src="https://7fb1fd45-24ce-4ade-b5c4-9ee55ec99526.poki-gdn.com/403f9f7f-52b0-4fa1-a4c2-c46883d239b6/index.html"#src="https://7fb1fd45-24ce-4ade-b5c4-9ee55ec99526.poki-gdn.com/403f9f7f-52b0-4fa1-a4c2-c46883d239b6/index.html"#' $(find . -name "bad-ice-cream-3.html")


# The translation of "åˆ¶ä½œæ–¹: Nitrome" needs to be handled for each language.
# This is too complex for a single script without knowing the translations. I will do the structural change first.
# The user can then ask for translations if needed.
# The iframe src is also different for each game. I'll need to update them properly.
# This script is getting too complex and risky. I'll do it file by file. That's safer.
echo "This is too complex. I will do it step by step, which is safer."
exit 1;
```
